name: Unidentified_Tusken_Raider_guard

attributes.name: Died
values: During a skirmish in a village

content:
A Tusken Raider male guard protected an unidentified village. When the village was attacked by bandits who followed Kouru, a Dark Lord of the Sith, the guards stepped in to defend the villagers after being signaled by the chief. When the Sith killed their Trandoshan commander, the second wave of bandits attacked the rest of the guards. The Tusken managed to escape and battled a bandit with his gaderffii stick. However, he was violently gunned down.
The Tusken Raider guard appeared in "The Duel," a short film in the Star Wars: Visions series directed by Takanobu Mizuno, produced by Kamikaze Douga, and released on Disney+ on September 22, 2021. He was voiced by Takaki Ootomari in the original Japanese and by Michael Sinterniklaas in the English dub.
